name: Mailman (itch) (DamienKusters)
description:
Mailman was made for the LÖVE Jam 2023.

Deliver as many mails as you can within two minutes.
The mailman (on the left) must be able to deliver their mail to the receiver with the same colour.

Game & Assets are made by Damien Kusters (https://damienkusters.itch.io/)
Sound effects are generated using 'jsfxr' (https://sfxr.me/)

(Made with LÖVE 11.4)

Controls:

W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys
Move Cursor
Spacebar
Rotate Tile
EscExit
